testcase.classname: Validate the Login functionality test scenarios
testcase.name: Validate user is able to login using Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User have "Valid" Credentials username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce".passed When User enters the Credentials in the Login Screen........................passed Then User should be able to successfully login into the application.........passed Then User should be able to successfully logout from the application........passed

testcase.classname: Validate the Login functionality test scenarios
testcase.name: Validate user is not able to login using InValid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User have "Invalid" Credentials username "invalid_user" and password "secret_sauce".passed When User enters the Credentials in the Login Screen........................passed Then User should see error message "Username and password do not match any user in this service." on Login Screen.passed

testcase.classname: Validate the Login functionality test scenarios
testcase.name: Validate user is not able to login using InValid Credentials 2
testcase.system-out: Given User have "Invalid" Credentials username "standard_user" and password "invalid_sauce".passed When User enters the Credentials in the Login Screen........................passed Then User should see error message "Username and password do not match any user in this service." on Login Screen.passed

testcase.classname: Validate the Login functionality test scenarios
testcase.name: Validate user is not able to login using InValid Credentials 3

failure.message: expected:<Username [is required]> but was:<Username [and password do not match any user in this service.]>

testcase.failure:

testcase.classname: Validate the Product Details Page Navigation
testcase.name: Validate user is able to login using Valid Credentials and Navigate to Products details page
testcase.system-out: Given User have "Valid" Credentials username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce".passed When User enters the Credentials in the Login Screen........................passed Then User should be able to successfully login into the application.........passed And User should be able to see the 1st product as "Sauce Labs Backpack".....passed And User should be able to see the 2nd product as "Sauce Labs Bike Light"...passed Then User should be able to successfully logout from the application........passed
